click_button_slow.description: Gently press the button in a relaxing manner.

single_click_button.description: Single click the button of the mouse.

long_press_button.description: Long press the button of the mouse.

double_click_button.description: Double-click the button of the mouse.

press_button.description: Press the button of the mouse.

rotate_wheel_slow.description: Slowly rotate the wheel of the mouse.

rotate_wheel_fast.description: Quickly rotate the wheel of the mouse.

rotate_wheel_clockwise_fast.description: Rotate the wheel of the mouse quickly in a clockwise direction.

rotate_wheel_counterclockwise_slow.description: Slowly rotate the wheel of the mouse in a counterclockwise direction.

rotate_wheel_clockwise.description: Rotate the wheel of the mouse clockwise.

rotate_wheel_counterclockwise.description: Rotate the wheel of the mouse counterclockwise.

clean_left_side.description: Clean the left side of the mouse body.

clean_right_side.description: Clean the right side of the mouse body.

wipe_mouse_back_part.description: Clean the back part of the mouse body to remove dust or any other particles.

wipe_mouse_front_part.description: Clean the front part of the mouse body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_mouse_top.description: Clean the top of the mouse body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_mouse_bottom.description: Clean the bottom of the mouse body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_mouse_body.description: Clean the body of the mouse to remove dust or any other particles.

wipe_mouse_top.description: Wipe the top of the mouse body to remove dust or any other particles.

wipe_mouse_bottom.description: Wipe the bottom of the mouse body to remove dust or any other particles.

click_button_and_rotate_wheel.description: Click the button and rotate the wheel.

rotate_wheel_and_click_button.description: Rotate the wheel and click the button.

clean_and_use_mouse.description: Clean the entire mouse and then click the button and rotate the wheel.

clean_mouse_body_and_press_button.description: Clean the mouse body, then single click the button.

clean_mouse_and_rotate_wheel_slow.description: Clean the entire mouse, including the button, wheel, and mouse body, then slowly rotate the wheel.

rotate_wheel_fast_and_press_button.description: Quickly rotate the wheel of the mouse, then press the button.

long_press_button_and_rotate_wheel_slow.description: Long press the button of the mouse and then slowly rotate the wheel.

clean_mouse_and_press_button.description: Clean the whole mouse, including the button, wheel, and mouse body, then press the button.

rotate_wheel_and_clean_mouse.description: Rotate the wheel of the mouse, then clean the entire mouse, including the button, wheel, and mouse body.

clean_whole_mouse.description: Clean the entire mouse including the button, wheel, and mouse body.

press_button_and_rotate_wheel.description: Press the button and then rotate the wheel of the mouse.

rotate_wheel_and_press_button.description: Rotate the wheel and then press the button of the mouse.

clean_and_press.description: Clean the whole mouse including the button, wheel, and mouse body, then push the button.

rotate_and_wipe.description: Fast rotate the mouse wheel and then clean the whole mouse including the button, wheel, and mouse body.

press_and_rotate.description: Push the mouse button and rotate the mouse wheel.

rotate_and_press.description: Rotate the mouse wheel and push the button.

cleaning_and_rotation.description: Clean the whole mouse, including the button and mouse body, then rotate the wheel.
